description: This file contains C source code for diagnostic functions related to IP configuration, specifically for internal use within a COSA Data Model library. It includes function definitions for retrieving interface addresses and route hop numbers, with external API calls and memory management.

methods.name: void CosaGetInferfaceAddrByNamePriv(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Retrieves the IP address associated with a network interface by name and stores it in the diagnostic ping info structure.

methods.name: BOOL CosaDmlDiagGetRouteHopsNumberPriv(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,ULONG * puLong)
methods.description: Sets the route hops number to zero, indicating no route hops information is available or implemented.
